name: In the Name of the Hanoi
text:
This Skill can only be used once per turn. The effect of this Skill will change based on the number of times this skill is used:
● One time: Reveal 1 "Cracking Dragon" in your hand. During this turn, you can Normal Summon "Cracking Dragon" without tributing.
● Two times: Return 2 DARK monsters in your hand to the Deck, and add 1 "Hack Worm" and 1 "Jack Wyvern" from outside of your Deck to your hand. During this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck, and you can only special summon DARK Monsters.
● Thee times and on: Until the end of the turn, your "Cracking Dragon" gains 300 ATK for each DARK monster you control.
